title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 403.7 - Other responsibilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 403.7 - Other responsibilities

State Regulations
(a) Each
program shall establish, maintain, and keep such records as are required to
show compliance with this Part for a period of six years after the successful
completion of training, unless otherwise directed by the department or the New

York State Education Department. (b) Each entity shall establish, maintain, and keep such records as are required to show compliance with this Part for a
period of six years after the termination of a worker's employment, unless
otherwise directed by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
403.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
